stripped_text: If a current is active, News Hound gains "Subroutine End the run." after all its other subroutines. Subroutine Trace[3]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
text: If a current is active, News Hound gains "[subroutine] End the run." after all its other subroutines. [subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
title: News Hound
